reviews.review_text: i've been playing for like 20 seconds and it's pretty good so far   'You need to have used this product for at least 5 minutes before posting a review for it (1 minutes on record).'  - classic platformer with some really pretty graphics - the masks add an interesting twist  (minor) cons - the 3d aspect sometimes makes it a little unclear as to what parts of the platform you can actually step on  ...that being said, i think this game would do well as a 3ds (eshop?) game  - the font used for the text of the story is.....not the most visually appealing
